snippet: When you’ve met as many people as Newt Gingrich has, it can be hard to keep track of them all, especially on a campaign trail full of “Remember me?” confrontations with well-wishers.
abstract: Newt Gingrich, barnstorming in Georgia ahead of the Republican presidential primary, regularly encounters people on the campaign trail who expect to be remembered from brief meetings in the past; like many other politicians, Gingrich has become adept at warm but non-committal greetings.
lead_paragraph: When you’ve met as many people as Newt Gingrich has, it can be hard to keep track of them all, especially on a campaign trail full of “Remember me?” confrontations with well-wishers.

headline.main: We’ve Met Before? Of Course! I Remember It Well.
headline.print_headline: We’ve Met Before? Of Course! I Remember It Well.
